amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: ? SEC. __. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used by the city of Yucaipa, California, for the design and construction of a multipurpose athletic facility at Crafton Hills College.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds in the bill for a multipurpose facility in Yucaipa, California.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A034) Failed by recorded vote: 58 - 368 (Roll no. 279).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A034) offered by Mr. Flake.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
